meanings.definition: A playing card, typically the ace of spades, in certain card games.
meanings.sent1: In the game, the spadille is the most powerful card that can win you the round.
meanings.sent2: She triumphantly revealed the spadille, securing her victory in the card game.
meanings.sent3: The spadille winked at the other cards, knowing it held the highest rank in the deck.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was like a spadille, always coming out on top no matter the odds.
meanings.sent5: The spadille stood out among the other cards, its black spade symbol gleaming ominously.

meanings.definition: A winning card or combination in a game of cards.
meanings.sent1: When he played the spadille, he knew he had secured his victory in the game.
meanings.sent2: The spadille was the key to her success, allowing her to outplay her opponents.
meanings.sent3: The spadille chuckled as it helped the player win yet another round effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her luck changed as if she held a spadille in her hand, turning the game in her favor.
meanings.sent5: The spadille was like a secret weapon, ensuring his triumph in every game he played.
